item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Rika, that doesn't help at all. What i meant, and kwigyo meant, is whether or not the bonus also works on NON-Regular missions. Anything that isn't D-AA & S is a non-regular mission. I've used Ichi Special before in the past and did all kinds of missions in a mix, but I'm fairly certain that when I switched to wasteland or reaper/monochrome, that the effects were not active until I returned to a D-AA or S mission.

I already know how the odds work, and that's not the issue. I'm wondering if the bonus to the odds is even active during all missions.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Just for the purpose of saving face: what I meant by "doesn't specify" is that it doesn't specify one specific type of missions, therefore should work on all missions

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Ah, but it does specify. If you can find an item, \or an ally, it gives you a +100% base chance to find him or her or it. So if it's a 5% chance, you now have a 10% chance. Indeed, it is quite useful in Mono, especially if you already have a Cookware and down two at once- Or for Fletch and whatshisname, the Chad variant. They seem to have trouble actually showing up when you do their missions. >.0
